nodes.body:
I worked my way up from helping old ladies update windows, 
to installing/setting up networks for small businesses to adminstarting servers and web servecies 

Sadly I didnt keep a list of all the contracts I've done over the course of six years but I can 
tell you the most valuable skill I learned was how to meeet an endusers needs. This requires the 
abilitiy to draw proper scope, collecting the right requirements and understnading what 
the user wants. 

Some people think a computer is just a monitor others think its witch craft that is beyond them.
As an Engineer or Technican its your job to level with the user and speech their languge not 
java.

This also made me a little to reliant on deadlines and strcutre in the workplace which I delt with 
alot working at my for *SaySo*
